sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
h1 ТАБЛИЦА-ДЕРЕВО
container
  vue-tree(style='width: 100%; height: 800px; border: 5px solid gray', :dataset='richMediaData', :config='treeConfig', :collapse-enabled = false)
    template(v-slot:node='{ node, collapsed }')
        .rich-media-node(@click="redirectToAbout(node)" :style="{ border: collapsed ? '2px solid grey padding: 100px' : '' }")
            //- <router-link to="/about">About</router-link>
            h4(style="padding: 4px 0; font-weight: bold") {{ node.value }}
            //
              img(
                  :src="node.avatar"
                  style="width: 48px; height: 48px; border-raduis: 4px"
              )
</template>

<script>
import VueTree from "@ssthouse/vue3-tree-chart";
import "@ssthouse/vue3-tree-chart/dist/vue3-tree-chart.css";
// import { loadJsonTaxonTree } from "@/api.js";
import jsonData from "@/taxonTree.json";
export default {
  name: "TreeMap",
  components: { VueTree },
  data() {
    return {
      // richMediaData: null,
      richMediaData: jsonData,
      treeConfig: { nodeWidth: 130, nodeHeight: 0, levelHeight: 300 },
    };
  },
  methods: {
    redirectToAbout(node) {
      console.log(node);
      this.$router.push({
        name: "about",
        params: {
          name: node.name,
        },
      });
    },
  },
  created() {
    // this.richMediaData = loadTaxonTree();
    // this.ruchMediaData = loadJsonTaxonTree();
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped lang="stylus">
container
  // display: flex
  // flex-direction: column
  // align-items: center
  // padding 0 0
  // display: grid;
  // grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, 75px);
  // grid-gap: 20px;
  // border: 1px solid black;
  // resize: horizontal;
  // overflow: hidden;



.rich-media-node
  // margin-block: 40px
  &>h4
    font: italic 1.2em "Fira Sans", serif;
  width: 115px
  height: 10px
  padding: 5px
  display: flex
  flex-direction: column
  align-items: center
  justify-content: center
  color: white
  background-color: #006633
  border-radius: 50px
  // text-align: auto
</style>
